footer.brandDesc: Promoting Hanfu culture in Ireland. Professional Hanfu experience, rental, and sales.
footer.subscribeDesc: Get the latest events and news

home.bannerSlogan: In the Emerald Isle, encounter a millennium of splendid attire. We offer Hanfu rental, sales, and cultural experiences, connecting the beauty of tradition and modernity.
home.feature1Desc: All costumes are high-quality, authentic Hanfu.
home.feature2Desc: Every customer enjoys a complimentary professional photoshoot.
home.feature4Desc: Located in Dublin city centre, with convenient transport.
home.step1Desc: Browse our Hanfu collection and pick your favorite style.
home.step2Desc: Select a suitable date and time to book easily.
home.step3Desc: Change into Hanfu, enjoy the moment, and capture beautiful photos.
home.testimonial1: A fantastic experience! The Hanfu is beautiful, and the staff are very friendly.
home.testimonial2: It felt like traveling back in time. Highly recommended!
home.testimonial3: The photos are beautiful, and the memories are unforgettable.
home.faq1Q: How to book a Hanfu experience?
home.faq1A: You can book online or contact us via email or phone.
home.faq2A: Yes, each experience includes a complimentary professional photoshoot.
home.faq3A: Yes, please contact us at least 24 hours in advance.

survey.title: Hanfu Experience Survey
survey.description: Interested in traditional costumes? Participate in our Dublin Hanfu-themed party survey to help us plan better events!

recognition.correct: Congratulations, that's correct! This is Hanfu.
recognition.incorrect: Not quite, this is {alt}. Hanfu is the correct answer.

education.title: Understanding Hanfu
education.description: Hanfu is the traditional clothing of the Han ethnic group, with a history of thousands of years. It is not just clothing, but a cultural inheritance and a symbol of elegance.

styles.elegant_desc: Mostly used for formal occasions and ceremonies.
styles.casual_desc: Comfortable styles suitable for daily wear.
styles.historical_desc: Classic designs originating from ancient dynasties.

gallery.bannerDesc: Explore the art of clothing that spans thousands of years, each piece carrying the essence of Chinese civilization.
